sources.description:
It's Friday@PizzaFLIX 
CAPTURED LIVE on KINOSCOPE!
Starring: Charlton Heston, Mary Sinclair, Richard Waring
Writer: Emily Bront√´ (based on a novel by)
Director: Paul Nickell
üçïSTUDIO ONE Season 10 Episode 1üçï
In this TV adaptation of Emily Bront√´‚Äôs Gothic masterpiece, screen legend Charlton Heston stars as the brooding and tragic Heathcliff, with the object of his obsession, the passionate and haunting Catherine, portrayed by Mary Sinclair. 

TRIVIA: Studio One began as a CBS radio drama in the 1940s and was reborn as a television series in 1948. It became the longest-running one-hour dramatic anthology in television history!
